entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
